text: Hello - I was looking at the academy courses and not seeing anything specific to Admin role - looking to the community to see if someone has identified courses through out the different hubs that could fall under this

Hi David, the HubSpot Admin group hosts weekly webinars that you can register for here <https://events.HubSpot.com/HubSpot-admins/>

Here are the most popular academy courses for Marketing Hub: Inbound Marketing Fundamentals
Marketing Software Certification
HubSpot Marketing Implementation Certification (Partner only)
Inbound Marketing Certification
HubSpot Portal Overview - Marketing Hub
Accelerated Setup - Marketing Hub Webinar

Sales Hub: Sales Enablement
HubSpot Sales Software
HubSpot Sales Implementation Certification (Partner only)
Inbound Sales Certification
Sales Management Training Certification
Accelerated Setup - Sales Hub Webinar
